review: Be prepared for advertisements on the home screen, content that autoplays despite autoplay being turned off, recommendations for content on hulu even if you don't like or use the hulu service, even if you have removed the hulu app, constant and distracting images that blink, preloaded applications that you will have to remove yourself, and a complete disregard for a users who might not like any of these things.  It's not an experience that can be personalized.  It's a box made to intrude upon your life with constant sales pitches.  You pay for the service, you pay for the box, but apparently that isn't enough, you have to endure the whim of whomever pays them the most to shove product at you.
